jwiki.core

Class WTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • jwiki.core.WTask

  • public class WTask
extends Object
    Class containing static methods which can perform miscellaneous tasks pertaining to MediaWiki.
    Author:
    Fastily

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BufferedImage downloadFile(String title, int height, int width, Wiki wiki)
      Downloads a media file from wiki and converts it to a BufferedImage, for use with GUI applications.
      static boolean downloadFile(String title, String localpath, int height, int width, Wiki wiki)
      Downloads and writes a media file to disk.
      static boolean downloadFile(String title, String localpath, Wiki wiki)
      Downloads and writes a media file to disk.
      static BufferedImage downloadFile(String title, Wiki wiki)
      Downloads a media file from wiki and converts it to a BufferedImage, for use with GUI applications.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadFile

        public static boolean downloadFile(String title,
                                   String localpath,
                                   Wiki wiki)
        Downloads and writes a media file to disk. Note that the file must be visible to you in order to download it.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to download on the Wiki
        localpath - The pathname to save this file to (e.g. "/Users/Fastily/Example.jpg "). Note that if a file with that name already exists at that pathname, it will be overwritten!
        wiki - The wiki object to use.
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • downloadFile

        public static boolean downloadFile(String title,
                                   String localpath,
                                   int height,
                                   int width,
                                   Wiki wiki)
        Downloads and writes a media file to disk. Note that the file must be visible to you in order to download it.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to download on the Wiki
        localpath - The pathname to save this file to (e.g. "/Users/Fastily/Example.jpg "). Note that if a file with that name already exists at that pathname, it will be overwritten!
        height - The height thumbnail to retrieve (optional param, specify -1 to disable)
        width - The width thumbnail to retrieve (optional param, specify -1 to disable)
        wiki - The wiki object to use.
        Returns:
        True if we were successful.

      • downloadFile

        public static BufferedImage downloadFile(String title,
                                         Wiki wiki)
        Downloads a media file from wiki and converts it to a BufferedImage, for use with GUI applications. Note that the file must be visible to you in order to download it.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to download, including the "File:" prefix.
        wiki - The wiki object to use.
        Returns:
        A BufferedImage, or null if something went wrong.

      • downloadFile

        public static BufferedImage downloadFile(String title,
                                         int height,
                                         int width,
                                         Wiki wiki)
        Downloads a media file from wiki and converts it to a BufferedImage, for use with GUI applications. Note that the file must be visible to you in order to download it.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the file to download, including the "File:" prefix.
        height - The height thumbnail to retrieve (optional param, specify -1 to disable)
        width - The width thumbnail to retrieve (optional param, specify -1 to disable)
        wiki - The wiki object to use.
        Returns:
        A BufferedImage, or null if something went wrong.
